description: Contains information for changing a custom domain association.

parameters.name: CustomDomainName
parameters.description: The custom domain name for a changed custom domain association.

parameters.name: CustomDomainCertificateArn
parameters.description: The certificate Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the changed custom domain association.

parameters.name: ClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the cluster to change a custom domain association for.

nested_items.name: CustomDomainName
nested_items.description: The custom domain name associated with the result for the changed custom domain association.

nested_items.name: CustomDomainCertificateArn
nested_items.description: The certificate Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with the result for the changed custom domain association.

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the cluster associated with the result for the changed custom domain association.

nested_items.name: CustomDomainCertExpiryTime
nested_items.description: The certificate expiration time associated with the result for the changed custom domain association.
